title: Ground News - Boris Johnson promised to return to the yard and pound — but in all silence the Brexit idea is dead
text:
Summary by berlingske.dk 98.7 percent of Britons do not want the old, British units of measurement to return after Brexit, as promised by former Prime Minister Boris Johnson . Share menu More
